mapper.select: SELECT b."name" as nameBook , a."name" as nameAuthor, p."name" as namePublisher, b.quantitysold AS quantitySold FROM book b LEFT JOIN author a ON a.id = b.authorid LEFT JOIN publisher p ON p.id = b.publisherid WHERE b.deleted IS NOT TRUE ORDER BY b.quantitysold DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 10 OFFSET 0
